cujs.name: First-Time Installation
cujs.description: Successfully install and configure LLM-RULES in a new project.

cujs.name: Rule Configuration
cujs.description: Auto-detect project tech stack and configure appropriate rules.

cujs.name: Cross-Platform Setup
cujs.description: Sync LLM-RULES configuration across Claude Code, Cursor, and Factory Droid.

cujs.name: New Feature Planning
cujs.description: Create a comprehensive plan for implementing a new feature.
triggers: I want to build a user dashboard

cujs.name: Greenfield Project Planning
cujs.description: Plan and execute a complete new project from scratch.

cujs.name: Architecture Review
cujs.description: Review and analyze existing system architecture.

cujs.name: Technical Debt Planning
cujs.description: Plan refactoring of legacy code and technical debt.

cujs.name: Database Schema Planning
cujs.description: Design database schema for a feature or system.

cujs.name: Component Scaffolding
cujs.description: Generate rule-compliant component boilerplate.

cujs.name: API Endpoint Development
cujs.description: Create a new API endpoint with proper structure.

cujs.name: Bug Fix Workflow
cujs.description: Quickly fix a bug with validation.

cujs.name: Feature Implementation
cujs.description: Implement a complete feature following best practices.

cujs.name: Code Review
cujs.description: Comprehensive code review with systematic analysis.

cujs.name: Rule Compliance Audit
cujs.description: Validate code against project rules and standards.

cujs.name: Test Generation
cujs.description: Generate comprehensive test suite for code.

cujs.name: API Documentation
cujs.description: Generate comprehensive API documentation.

cujs.name: Module Documentation
cujs.description: Generate claude.md file for a module.

cujs.name: Architecture Documentation
cujs.description: Document system architecture with diagrams.

cujs.name: Performance Optimization
cujs.description: Optimize performance of system or component.

cujs.name: Security Audit
cujs.description: Audit system security and identify vulnerabilities.

cujs.name: Mobile Development
cujs.description: Develop mobile application features.

cujs.name: AI System Development
cujs.description: Develop AI/LLM features and systems.

cujs.name: Dependency Updates
cujs.description: Safely update project dependencies.

cujs.name: Incident Response
cujs.description: Respond to production incidents effectively.

cujs.name: Large Requirements Document Processing
cujs.description: Process a large requirements document (>15KB) without context window overflow.
triggers: User provides a markdown file > 15KB as requirements
Plan features from this document" (with large file)

cujs.name: Multi-Phase Project Planning
cujs.description: Plan a large project that requires multiple phases to manage context and complexity.
triggers: Plan a large-scale project with multiple phases
expected_outputs: Additional phase plan artifacts exist as needed

cujs.name: Workflow Recovery After Context Loss
cujs.description: Resume a workflow after context window exhaustion or session interruption.
triggers: Need to resume from last completed step
expected_outputs: New artifacts from resumed steps present

cujs.name: Infrastructure-First Development
cujs.description: Define concrete infrastructure resources before implementation to prevent rework.
triggers: Need for concrete resource names upfront
expected_outputs: Code files present using concrete resource names (Step 7)

cujs.name: Cloud Integration Workflow
cujs.description: Separate cloud integration from business logic implementation.

cujs.name: Multi-AI Validation Workflow
cujs.description: Validate code quality using multiple AI models for consensus.

cujs.name: Browser-Based UI Testing & Optimization
cujs.description: Find bugs, test all UI features, compare with documentation, review logs, measure performance, and get optimization recommendations for a web application.  **Persona**: Developer
triggers: Test all features and compare with documentation

cujs.name: Planner-First Workflow Validation
cujs.description: Validate the complete planner-first workflow process end-to-end, ensuring plans are created, artifacts flow correctly, and execution follows the plan.
expected_outputs: Artifacts present as specified in plan

cujs.name: Validation Failure Recovery
cujs.description: Test validation gate failures and retry logic to ensure the system handles validation errors gracefully and recovers automatically.
expected_outputs: Test plan artifact exists with validation scenarios
Gate files present with error details

cujs.name: Multi-Phase Project Execution
cujs.description: Test hierarchical planning with phase boundaries for large projects (>3000 lines), ensuring master plan and phase plans are structured correctly and only active phase plans are loaded.

cujs.name: Optional Artifact Handling
cujs.description: Test workflows with optional inputs to ensure graceful degradation when optional artifacts are missing and defaults are used appropriately.
expected_outputs: Plan artifact exists with optional artifact scenarios
Reasoning files present documenting optional input handling
validation-report.json artifact exists confirming graceful degradation

cujs.name: Cross-Agent Validation
cujs.description: Test cross-agent validation protocol to ensure agents can validate each other's work, resolve conflicts, and enforce quality gates with multiple validators.
expected_outputs: Validation result artifacts exist from each validator

cujs.name: Stateless Recovery Test
cujs.description: Verify the system can recover from scratch without any conversation history, ensuring all agents read from file system state rather than relying on memory or chat history.
triggers: Context window exhausted and new session started
expected_outputs: Initial workflow artifacts exist (project-brief.json, prd.json, etc.)
Gate files present for each completed step
Reasoning files present documenting stateless behavior
Updated plan document artifact exists after recovery

cujs.name: Complex Artifact Dependency Chain
cujs.description: Test deep artifact dependency chains (A→B→C→D→E) to ensure artifacts are properly passed between workflow steps and the artifact registry tracks all dependencies correctly.

cujs.name: Cursor Subagent Coordination
cujs.description: Test Cursor-specific subagent workflows to ensure seamless coordination between Cursor subagents, proper use of Cursor Plan Mode, and correct artifact sharing via `.cursor/plans/`.

cujs.name: Workflow Interruption Recovery
cujs.description: Test mid-workflow interruption and recovery to ensure no work is lost when workflows are interrupted mid-step, and the system can resume from checkpoints.

cujs.name: Agent Fallback Chain
cujs.description: Test fallback agent routing when primary agents fail, ensuring fallback agents receive correct context, artifacts are preserved, and the system recovers gracefully.
triggers: Primary agent fails with non-recoverable error
Primary agent produces invalid output after retries
expected_outputs: error-details.json artifact exists from primary agent

cujs.name: Missing Required Artifact Recovery
cujs.description: Test recovery when required artifacts are missing, ensuring the system can detect missing artifacts, recreate them when possible, and recover gracefully.
triggers: Previous step failed to create artifact

cujs.name: Feature Distillation Edge Cases
cujs.description: Test feature distillation process with edge cases: very large documents, malformed markdown, missing critical information, multiple document formats, and validation failures.
triggers: Test feature distillation with large document" (>50KB)
Test feature distillation with malformed markdown
expected_outputs: features-distilled.json artifacts exist for each edge case scenario
Validation result artifacts exist for each scenario

cujs.name: Multi-Agent Conflict Resolution
cujs.description: Test conflict detection and resolution when multiple agents produce conflicting outputs, ensuring conflicts are detected, escalated appropriately, and resolved through consensus or authority.
triggers: Agents produce conflicting requirements or decisions

cujs.name: Artifact Registry Comprehensive Test
cujs.description: Test artifact registry robustness: corruption recovery, concurrent artifact registration, validation failures, missing registry recovery, and registry synchronization.
triggers: Registry corruption or synchronization issues detected
expected_outputs: Registry integrity validation report artifacts exist

cujs.name: Cursor Plan Mode Deep Integration
cujs.description: Test deep integration between Planner Agent (strategic planning) and Cursor Plan Mode (implementation planning), ensuring seamless handoff, artifact linking, and coordinated execution.
triggers: Validate Planner Agent to Plan Mode handoff
Test strategic plan to implementation plan linking
User requests implementation after strategic plan created
expected_outputs: Linked artifacts with bidirectional references present

cujs.name: End-to-End Workflow Robustness
cujs.description: Test complete workflow resilience: multiple failure points, recovery at each stage, context loss at different points, validation failures throughout, and complete workflow completion after failures.
triggers: Test workflow recovery from multiple failures
Workflow encounters failures at various stages
expected_outputs: Recovered artifacts present after each failure

cujs.name: Artifact Publishing Validation
cujs.description: Validate that artifact-publisher skill correctly publishes artifacts and integrates with artifact registry.
expected_outputs: Registry metadata artifact exists with publishing status
Error handling test result artifacts exist

cujs.name: Artifact Registry Migration Test
cujs.description: Test migration from legacy artifact-registry.mjs to run-manager.mjs, ensuring backward compatibility and data integrity.
expected_outputs: Backward compatibility test result artifacts exist

cujs.name: Publishing Metadata Persistence Test
cujs.description: Validate that publishing metadata persists correctly across workflow runs and system restarts.
expected_outputs: Test artifacts present with publishing metadata

cujs.name: Cross-Platform Publishing Sync Test
cujs.description: Validate that publishing metadata syncs correctly across Claude, Cursor, and other platforms using context-bridge skill.

cujs.name: Publishing Retry Logic Test
cujs.description: Validate that publishing retry logic works correctly with exponential backoff and tracks all attempts in registry.
expected_outputs: Test artifacts present with various publishing scenarios
Registry files exist with retry attempt tracking: `.claude/context/runtime/runs/<run_id>/artifact-registry.json`
Timing measurement artifacts exist for backoff delays

cujs.name: Workflow Recovery Protocol Test
cujs.description: Test the recovery skill's ability to restore workflow state from file system artifacts after context loss or session interruption.
expected_outputs: Initial workflow artifacts exist (project-brief.json, prd.json, etc.)
Recovered workflow state documentation files present

cujs.name: Plan Rating Validation
cujs.description: Validate that the response-rater skill correctly enforces the minimum 7/10 plan quality score.

cujs.name: Error Recovery and Workflow Resilience Validation
cujs.description: Validate that workflows can recover from failures using retry logic, fallback agents, and checkpoint restoration.
expected_outputs: `.claude/context/runtime/runs/{{run_id}}/recovery.json`: Recovery log with retry attempts and fallback activations

cujs.name: Workflow Performance Optimization
cujs.description: Optimize workflow execution performance through parallel agent execution, checkpoint optimization, and resource management.

cujs.name: Cross-Platform CUJ Testing
cujs.description: Validate that Customer User Journeys (CUJs) work consistently across Claude Code, Cursor, and Factory Droid platforms.

cujs.name: Artifact Publishing Workflow
cujs.description: Publish workflow artifacts to the project feed for cross-platform visibility and collaboration.
expected_outputs: Published artifacts present in project feed with sharing links

cujs.name: Skill Integration Validation
cujs.description: Validate that all skills (currently 43) are correctly integrated with their respective agents and trigger properly in workflows.

cujs.name: Error Recovery and Checkpoint Restoration
cujs.description: Tests the error recovery mechanisms to ensure workflows can recover from failures gracefully.

cujs.name: Search Functionality
cujs.description: Search codebase and documentation using Algolia-powered semantic search to quickly find relevant code patterns, documentation, and implementation examples.
expected_outputs: search-results.json artifact exists with structured search results
Code snippet artifacts present with context
File path and line number artifacts exist
search-metadata.json artifact exists with search execution metadata
